Our expert's view of the main contenders and likely winner of the race. Part of RACINGPOST.com Members' Club

A competitive race but a decent opportunity for DOM D´ORGEVAL, who is thrown in on his old form, to build on his encouraging third here on his first run back with Nick Williams. I´moncloudnine needs to put a modest run behind him but could provide the biggest threat.
